items.preText:
Tafadzwa Mareya: "With the return of Taylor and Jarvis surely Zimbabwe must pull a cat out of the bag. Previously we used behind thw two saying thy retired too early. What are we going to say now that thr back and we still not striking the right codes?"

Shawon: "This pair was going really well on this inconsistent pitch. It must be a relief for the visitors. Time for another good partnership for the host though "
items.text: short of length outside off, Imrul goes for a cut but the ball kept low as he misses out
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: length ball, pushed towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: length again, defended by Imrul
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: length outside off, dabbed towards point for a quick single
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: fuller on stumps, driven towards long-on
items.shortText: Williams to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: a mix-up there. It was a length ball and Imrul works it around the corner, straight to the fielder but the non-striker was half-way down the track. However, he manages to undo his steps just in time
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: length ball, just around off, defended
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: length outside off, punched off the back foot but straight to the cover fielder
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.preText: khan: "finger crossed.... from here on i will just watch. no more comments. please don't publish." -- Are you sure?
items.text: and another one departs, Mehidy Hasan this time and it's the fifth catch for Brandon Taylor. It was a length ball outside off, Mehidy went for the cut only to edge it behind
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT

dismissal.text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz c †Taylor b Jarvis 1 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 25.00

items.preText: Tasmeem: "Jarvis is turning the match around." -- Bangladesh have lost three for two here. Saifuddin now
items.text: length outside off, punched off the back foot towards covers
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.preText: Md Mahabubul Al: "Surely visitors are doing well but the behavior of the pitch is also unpredictable. Hope Home team will able to put a competitive score."
items.text: length ball, just around off, kept a tad low but Saifuddin got his bat down just in time
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: a tad fuller this time, Saifuddin comes forward and pushes it towards cover
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.preText:
Saif: "@khan You jinxed it again."

Tasmeem: "Stop jinxing all the batsmen, man. Though that was a very poor shot given the situation from Mehidy."

Tiripano replaces Williams
items.text: short of length around off, defended
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: short of length around off, extra bounce there, pushed towards point
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: short of length once again but some room outside off this time, slashed towards sweeper cover
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Nakhtar Romaan: "Is Tamim still not feeling well? Don`t know why he is not seen in the squad. " -- He injured his hand during the Asia Cup
items.text: fuller but way too outside off, on the second bounce to the wicketkeeper
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 wide

items.text: edged and taken by Ervine at first slip. It was short of length, extra bounce once again doing the trick as Saifuddin pushes at it. A low catch there by Ervine but the umpires are not sure. They are checking upstairs, the soft signal is not out, mind you. Does he have his fingers underneath, it's very difficult to judge. After a million replays, the third umpire makes his decision in favour of the batsman
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.preText:
Sonal Trivedi: "Mehidy Hasan Miraz c †Taylor b Jarvis jinxed Khan"

Tasmeem: "Imrul needs to play a blinder like Hetmyer is playing for West Indies."
items.text: and beaten. A similar line and length and similar response by the batsman. The only difference is he missed it this time
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, defended on this occasion
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: short of length, around middle and off, defended
items.postText: Some halt here. Something seems to have entered Imrul's eye. And the umpires think it's the right time for drinks
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.preText:
Wow, what a set of jinx-ers we have got today.

Mudassir Hussai: "@Tasmeem you jinxed Hetmyer too Wallah, habibi don't spoil windies game please."

Tasmeem: "And I've jinxed Hetmyer. Sigh."

Mizan Sohag: "@Nakhtar Romaan, are you fan of Bangladesh?? you dont know yet why Tamim not in this match?" -- Agree. No Bangladesh fan can ever forget Tamim's brave effort to come out to bat with a fractured wrist

ASMAH: "Tasmeem has jinxed Hetmyer now..He is out on 106.."
items.text: short and pulled away but a brilliant diving effort by the man at deep square leg to keep it to just one
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: a tad fuller on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.preText: Sonal Trivedi: "Zim is missing khan comments... Tasmeem... Plz continue :)"
items.text: short of length on the pads, and another single to square leg
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: short of length, climbing towards the batsman who does well to keep it down, one more to square leg
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: better line this time, length ball just around off stump, defended towards covers
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, no run
